title: Apple Tree
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 43 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 130L
description: All living things have a life cycle. Apple Tree introduces this concept to young readers using a familiar and engaging topic--apples! Students will also be introduced to the high-frequency words first, next, and then. Early readers will also have the opportunity to ask and answer questions and to sequence events.
meta: blooms, comes, cycle, grows, sprout, wait
Discriminate Initial Consonant Blend : Discriminate initial consonant tr-blends
Declarative Sentences : Recognize and use declarative sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
